front.title: •Meditation (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on your character of ability > 3. Opponent's aliens here are power -1 (and forfeit -2 if a leader, [Maintenance], or [Permanent Weapon] card). During battle at same site, if opponent has more characters participating than you, may add one battle destiny (then lose Effect at end of battle).
front.lore: To prepare for the inevitable conflict with Jabba's minions, Luke entered a calm state of mental preparation.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
